product_title: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Tenis
reviews.content: Están hermosos estos tenis , pero los regrese por que no le quedaron a mi hija, pero los vuelvo a comprar cuando encontré de mi talla!
reviews.author: Aracely
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Love these Nikes! My opinion not for narrow feet!
reviews.content: For not liking sneakers I love these Nikes! I don't have a lot to compare them too so I did my best review.  I am a shoe person haha. As far as arch support In my opinion it is great. High arch support. Now I Wear a true 7.5/8 M. I bought an 8. I am wearing a thin low cut no show sock. These fit true to size with perfect room in the toe box. I stated above I'm an average or ( M) width. These are perfect for me especially post surgery on my left foot.  However, it is my opinion if you have a narrow foot These probably are not the best shoe for you. If my feet were no a bit swollen they'd be to wide for me and by no means am I narrow. I'm also going to swap insoles. There will be room for orthotic insoles. These are extremely comfortable they are sharp looking and they are light weight. I trust this review has been helpful.
reviews.author: danielle
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Great Shoe
reviews.content: I have been looking for the shoes for a long time they just were not available. I am so glad I found them, they are my favorite shoe, love the way they fit and feel and they last.
reviews.author: Happy
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Perfect for jogging on pavement or trails.
reviews.content: Love these shoes. Very comfortable for exercise.
reviews.author: Mama B
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Good shoes
reviews.content: Well made. Can be washed in machine.
reviews.author: CUSTOMER 7
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Awesome shoe, True to size, & Worth the price!!!
reviews.content: Love everything about this shoe.  The fit was perfect, design is beautiful but athletic, and the mesh design, makes it very comfortable.  Can’t beat the price for a well made shoe.  Worth the price. I have to wear orthopedic arch supports, so my true description of arch support is really n/a.  Nonetheless, the shoes fit great without them as well as with them.
reviews.author: BR549
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Great Sneakers
reviews.content: Sneakers fit well. True to fit. I’m a size 9 and it fit perfect. The only problem I encountered is that the box was crushed all over. Inside the box the tissue paper was all ripped up. I know this might not sound like a big deal but it is. I keep my sneakers in the box they came in as I have a lot of sneakers. I expect the inside packing or to be torn up either. I’ve only tried them on and they feel good. I’m sure they’re going to feel just fine when I’m wearing them.
reviews.author: Myeyes
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: It was a gift and they were happy
reviews.content: Liked the support, light weight and plenty wide !
reviews.author: Ryan Williams
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Cute & Comfortable
reviews.content: Love these! Not only are they super comfortable they are super cute. I get compliments on them all the time. (Some lady in the airport looked them up and bought them while sitting next to me) I like gym shoes that feel small and tight to my foot, not big and bulky, and these are perfect.
reviews.author: Sarah Elizabeth
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Order next size up! This shoe is cut small.
reviews.content: I ordered an entire size up for this shoe, I normally wear a size 10 & I ordered an 11. Perfect fit with the size 11, just a thumbnail space at top of big toe. Typical Nike narrow fit and little to no arch support with this shoe. It's comfortable for me, but if you are some one who needs extra support, especially at the arch this shoe would not be a good choice. The shoe is light weight and picture is accurate to product design & colors.
reviews.author: Zen
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: True to Size!
reviews.content: Quick arrival and perfect fit! I admit I was skeptical at first taking them out of the box and looking so large for a size 9. I was wearing size 8 shoes and after my 2nd baby girl I needed to move up a size. Yet man am I grateful. These shoes will keep my feet comfortable walking around at work and still super stylish ;) Now I may have to grab another color! Thank you Nike!
reviews.author: Ashley
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Stylish, supportive, Comfortable
reviews.content: I  usually do not buy Nikes because of the narrow fit on me.  but I read the reviews and gave it a shot.  Well I couldn't be happier! These have been comfortable from the minute I put them on!  They seem wider than the typical Nikes I've bought and extremely supportive..  I walk and workout and they've been perfect.  I recently have had some lower back pain and am trying to wear these which really helps.  You can't go wrong with these shoes.  I already ordered another pair and a pair for my daughter.
reviews.author: Ruthie
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Same as 2 years ago
reviews.content: Wife wanted identical pair she had bought 2 years ago and worn them out. I think I overpaid some because it's not exactly Nike's current offering. Showed up quick considering ordered right at christmas time (4 days). And they were definitely brand new and fit just like 2 years ago when we bought same pair at the shoe store.
reviews.author: TimmA
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Comfortable right away and make my walk easier.
reviews.content: I don’t run.  I take a brisk walk each day.  My other shoes are thin soled and better suited for the gym.  These are very comfortable and seem true to size to me.  Didn’t really require a break in.  I always wear a seven in a Nike.  I have a wide foot.  6.5 length would work for me but would not be wide enough.
reviews.author: JWood
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Perfect fit
reviews.content: They were incredibly comfortable and loved how they look.
reviews.author: Virginia Wilson
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Great running shoes!
reviews.content: Best running shoes I’ve ever invested in! I am glad I ordered them a half size bigger as recommended in a couple of reviews I read. I love the roomy width across the toe box. They are perfect in size and look. Really great pair of runners.
reviews.author: Shelley M. Fontenelle
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Greatest athletic shoes EVER, greatest footwear ever.
reviews.content: So comfortable for any physical activity, walking, weights, yoga, and running the distance. The comfort is top notch and unmatched by any other I've ever worn, period. Great looking, and great for all physical activities, from walking all over doing errands to running a marathon. Best athletic shoes ever, hands down, worth every dollar, it is worth its price and beyond.  Highly recommend for all.
reviews.author: LDee
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Very comfortable and worth the money
reviews.content: This is what I’m talking about comfortable shoes! If I find these in other colors I will buy again. I fell in love with them and it was no surprise because that they will be this comfortable because most of my work shoes are Nike shocks. Expensive but worthy the money. Thank you amazon for carrying them.
reviews.author: Agnes Ngum
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Amazing beautiful shoe
reviews.content: I love this shoe. Most Nike shoes are narrow and don’t fit good. I crushed my right foot and have 13 screws and 8 plates so I have to have a good wide shoe with good support. I love this shoe it is perfect for my foot. Not only does it fit good it’s beautiful just love it. Going to buy a second pair. Great price as well.
reviews.author: Patricia S.
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Comfortable
reviews.content: These are the most comfortable shoes!!  I have plantar fasciitis and I have to have arch support inserts...spent 6 weeks in a boot and bought the shoes to wear after the boot came off.  They were so comfortable I was able to actually wear them without the inserts and have no pain.  Love love love.
reviews.author: angela snipes
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Not cloud #9 but not bad
reviews.content: I tried these because of the reviews. Now I wouldn't say I stepped on to a cloud, like some said, and definitely not cloud #9. With that said, I put my plantar fasciitis insole in. And my feet didn't hurt at the end of the day. I am a dental assistant so I am literally on my feet all day. I did go up 1\2 a size like some the reviews said. I like a little extra room. So of you like a more tight snug fit. Order ypur actual size and they probably will fit right to size.
reviews.author: Thea Heinrichs
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Great shoes.
reviews.content: Not shoes I wanted, but needed a pair I could actually walk in due to being pregnant and keeping up with my 2yr old outside. So I ordered these was bummed out till I received them I fell in love instantly I get so many compliments and when I say how much they cost people are wowed at how such great shoes are pricy, but not costing a arm and leg like most. However they do rub a little and are tight around the ankles (My ankles have not swollen yet only 3m along) SO I would least suggest socks that go a little above your ankle at least. I got a size 9 they are a little big on me so I would say order a size down or if you like the extra room get your normal size.
reviews.author: Shannon Jones
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.content: Left foot feels like you have a bunches up sock under your toes. I took out the inserts and it's the shoe itself not the insert. So that's annoying. Beautiful but can't wear them very long due to that. I would guess this is a one off issue so I wouldn't that stop you from ordering this was just my experience and only issue. ** update, I’ve had these several months now and wear them daily and the issue with the left shoe has corrected itself/flattened down. They have great support and still look new, clean up great. I will purchase them again. **
reviews.author: JODY
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Pretty shoe but runs small
reviews.content: I wear a 7 in most shoes, my Brooks shoes are a 7.5 so I ordered these in a 7.5 too and unfortunately they’re too small. The shoe is quite stiff going on, not a lot of give in them at all. I’m not sure I could run in these but they’re so beautiful I’m returning them and getting an 8 hoping those will fit better. It’s such a pretty shoe, but I’ll be looking for something else to run in and use these with my jeans or capris.
reviews.author: Serena
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Great shoe but can find less expensive at other stores
reviews.content: I absolute LOVE this shoe. Nike’s are usually hit or miss for me but these are wide enough, leave room to wiggle my toes and the sole is soft and supportive. Only problem I found buying them from Amazon is I bought them for just under $100 and two days after wearing them, Kohl’s had them on sale for $56!!! Shop around! You may find them for a better price elsewhere.
reviews.author: SarahSam
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Very comfortable
reviews.content: I usually have to buy a half size larger with Nike but surprisingly these would of fit my actual size.  I’ll keep anyway. I do like them!!

reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.content: Love the colors. Nike’s run small so I ordered a size 8, normally wear a 7.5. They fit really well but they are wide at the toes and I don’t like how wide they make my foot look.
reviews.author: Beth
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: As expected
reviews.content: Shoe looks nice. Pretty stiff material and will definitely need some breaking in. Moderate arch support. I usually wear a 7.5 and I bought a 8 and it will still be a little tight with socks on. Overall I’m satisfied with the purchase.

reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: After 20 returns
reviews.content: Just writing a rare review on these . I love Nike’s but my feet don’t usually. So I’ve ordered and returned a lot. Tried again lol and these ARE AMAZING comfortable. So much that I may order 3 more this year just to have them. The color is so cute and clean and sporty. I’m 99.9% sure I’ve dinally found a pair of Nikes I’m not going to return , fingers crossed 🤞😊

reviews.title: Cut into my ankle bones & not enough arch support
reviews.content: I've always had Nike running shoes because year after year they fit my little skinny foot with high arches. This particular shoe does not have the usual Nike arch support, and the fabric next to my ankles is up too high and rubs against my ankle if i don't wear thick enough socks. Love the plain color with pink - just what i wanted.  Just doesn't work for MY feet.

reviews.author: Beth Jones
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Cute shoes but no cushion
reviews.content: I fell in love with the look of these shoes.  I ordered them and when I got them they were so stiff and hurt my heels.  I’ve read mixed reviews on these but thought I’d try it anyway.  Unfortunately they didn’t work out for me and I returned them.  In my opinion they had no shock absorption.  I like to run on the pavement and needed something that would help with the shock.  I have Saucony cohesion’s and under armor charge 8 that are amazing.  Hope this review helps.
reviews.author: Jodi R
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Haven't tried on Nike's in years
reviews.content: Not a good fit for me.  The sole material is incredible stiff (hardly bendable). Compared to my old Gel Nimbus 16 Asics little front foot support for impact.  The heel fits fine ... shoe is tight around top of foot and toe box. I feel an odd bump in the ball of foot cushion.  Another half size up MIGHT do it (I always wear a 7 in running shoes and that's what I ordered), if it weren't for the other issues. I own a pair the original Nike's Lady running shoes from the 80's. They STILL fit perfectly!
reviews.author: CarrieK
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Bulky and heavy
reviews.content: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes are comfortable and the cushion is great BUT the fit is not good. They are very bulky and heavy, look huge on your foot (I wear 6 and looked like boats , a duck!) and size runs bigger - recommend sizing down half size for better fit. Returning these - going back to Asics.
reviews.author: 8SELLER
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Neh..
reviews.content: It is so bulky and hard. It makes your feet big but inside is tight. I kept it because I didn’t want to go shoe shopping in the midst of covid crisis and did not have any other option. Choose other shoes.

reviews.title: NOT  a running sneaker
reviews.content: Nice looking sneaker but definitely NOT for running. Very heavy hard and roomy on foot with no cushion or support.

reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Pretty Nice shoes

reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Don’t buy
reviews.content: Not worth it! If you want pain, buy these. After I week of attempting to break-in, my feet have blisters, they are in great pain. Sneakers in the garbage now.
reviews.author: Dina A
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Odd fit.
reviews.content: This shoe fit weird is best way to explain.  It fit wide and looked bulky on my foot.  Not sure if I mistakenly purchased wide fit.

reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: this shoe is to heavy
reviews.content: not happy with it its to heavy and you dont pay for me to return it. I will make sure I tell everyone I know never to order from your company. because we have to pay for return shipping. not happy at all. the shoe is very good looking but not worth it if you dont make your customers happy and provide return shipping fees.
reviews.author: Christina gutierrez
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: I don’t do reviews but  I felt I should share my honest opinion to try to help someone else
reviews.content: Appearance- very stylish, cute Fitting- I have small feet size 6 and these were really tight on my feet, the arch in the right shoe felt off which made for a uncomfortable feeling. Comfort- I’m on my feet a majority of the time that I’m awake and I’m constantly going, I tried these for half a day I couldn’t do it my feet hurt. These shoes are not breathable. I definitely do not feel that these are worth the money
reviews.author: Lacinda Herrmann
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: F.A.K.E  F.A.K.E F.A.KE. (You have been warned)
reviews.content: This sneaker is fake, everything about this FAKE. This is obviously a job done at a Chinese factory. It is just cut and glued together. DON'T BUY. FAKE.  I WAS ROBBED.  I AM SO DISAPPOINTED. I only selected 1 star because I had to select 1 to submit
reviews.author: dahlia martin
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Too heavy.
reviews.content: This sneaker is very heavy. When running it feels like you have lead in your shoes. Also for a size 9 I had to pay $40 more. If I ordered any other size the shoe was $40 less. Must be the extra lead they put in the size 9. For how much I paid, the sneaker was not what was expected.
reviews.author: Amazon Customer
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Returned
reviews.content: these look like Frankenstein shoes on me I did purchased a size 10 and I wear a 9 1/2 I thought I would use these for indoor running but they were like boats on me and did not sit well at all and we’re pretty heavy on my feet
reviews.author: Amanda
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: DID GET WHAT I WAS SUPPOSE TO  LOOK AT PICTURE I GOT SOLID WHITE SHOE

reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: "Stiff" shoe
reviews.content: I like to the look of the shoe but it is very 'stiff" and "bulky".  I tried to break it in for a couple of months but no luck. I cannot wear it to my crossfit workouts since it is not flexible.
reviews.author: Ms. M
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Very disappointed
reviews.content: Very disappointed in these shoes. I would have returned them but I was injured in an accident and not able to. They are cut really weird. I’m not sure they aren’t counterfeit or at the very least irregular
reviews.author: Amazon Customer
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Dirty
reviews.content: Very cute love the shoes except they sent them in a box that says the original box was damaged in transit and the shoes are dirty.  Paying over 100 for shoes and they are dirty is not acceptable
reviews.author: Steph
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Don’t buy if you have if you want comfort
reviews.content: I am 51, I have always bought Nike shoes because they have always fit my feet perfectly. Until I bought these shoes, the pair I bought are the most uncomfortable shoes I have ever purchased,
reviews.author: Kat
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Too stiff!
reviews.content: These shoes didn’t bend. They were the stiffest shoe I have ever held.  I returned them because it was like wearing a super stiff pair of cleats.
reviews.author: Diana
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: They hurt badly and are bulky
reviews.content: These shoes are nowhere near comfortable. They hurt my arch and bottom of my feet really bad. I am not able to wear them.
reviews.author: carla swain
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: Wrong size
reviews.content: Shoes are gorgeous. Too bad they sent me a 7.5 instead of the 9.5 I need. Yup they're going back and a big waste of my time.
reviews.author: Carrie Amerson
reviews.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)

reviews.title: The shoe is not true to size
reviews.content: The shoes are to big. I had a pair of these exact shoes and they are 1 extra size bigger.

reviews.title: Advertised as new, arrived used. Sent back
